Series.Actors: |Nina Dobrev|Paul Wesley|Ian Somerhalder|Joseph Morgan|Steven R. McQueen|Katerina Graham|Candice Accola|Matthew Davis|Sara Canning|Michael Trevino|Zach Roerig|Claire Holt|Rebekah|Torrey DeVitto|Daniel Gillies|
Series.Overview: As the school year begins, Elena Gilbert is immediately drawn to a handsome and mysterious new student, Stefan Salvatore. Elena has no way of knowing that Stefan is a vampire struggling to live peacefully among humans, while his brother Damon is the embodiment of vampire violence and brutality.
